mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Portrait by Leonore Coffee and William Joyce Cowen
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for Judith Anderson in the Aug 10-15, 1953 play Family Portrait by Leonore Coffee and William Joyce Cowen at the Intermont Outdoor Theatre in Bristol, Virginia. Presented by Robert Porterfield in the Virginia Highlands Festival.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
